rukus.text: 48|1|he nabee! hamane vijay[1] pradaan kar dee aapako khulee vijay.
48|2|taaki kshama kar de[1] allaah aapake lie, aapake agale tatha pichhale doshon ko tatha poora kare apana puraskaar, aapake oopar aur dikhaaye aapako seedhee raah.
48|3|tatha allaah aapakee sahaayata kare bharapoor sahaayata.

48|4|vahee hai, jisane utaaree shaanti eemaan vaalon ke dilon mein, taaki adhik ho jaaye unaka eemaan apane eemaan ke saath tatha allaah hee kee hain, aakaashon tatha dharatee kee senaayen tatha allaah sab kuchh aur sab gunon ko jaanane vaala hai.

48|5|taaki vah pravesh karaaye eemaan vaale purushon tatha striyon ko aise svargon mein, bah rahee hain jinamen naharen aur ve sadaiv rahenge unamen aur taaki door kar de unase, unakee buraeeyon ko aur allaah ke yahaan yahee bahut badee saphalata hai.

48|6|tatha yaatana de munaafiq purushon tatha striyon ko, jo bura vichaar rakhane vaale hain allaah ke sambandh mein. unheen par buree aapada aa padee tatha allaah ka prakop hua unapar aur usane dhikkaar diya unhen tatha taiyaar kar dee unake lie narak aur vah bura jaane ka sthaan hai.
48|7|tatha allaah hee kee hain aakaashon tatha dharatee kee senaayen aur allaah prabal tatha sab gunon ko jaanane vaala hai.
48|8|(he nabee!) hamane bheja hai aapako gavaah banaakar tatha shubh soochana dene evan saavadhaan karane vaala banaakar.
48|9|taaki tum eemaan lao allaah evan usake rasool par aur sahaayata karo aapakee tatha aadar karo aapaka aur allaah kee pavitrata ka varnan karate raho, praatah tatha sandhya.

48|10|(he nabee!) jo baiat kar rahe hain aapase, ve vaastav[1] mein baiat kar rahe hain allaah se. allaah ka haath unake haathon ke oopar hai. phir jisane vachan toda, to vah apane oopar hee vachan todega tatha jisane poora kiya jo vachan allaah se kiya hai, to vah use bada pratiphal (badala) pradaan karega.
